Package de.elo.ix.client.esearch

Class DocumentOptions

java.lang.Object
de.elo.ix.client.esearch.ESearchOptions
de.elo.ix.client.esearch.DocumentOptions
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class DocumentOptions
extends ESearchOptions
Use this class to search for documents by IXServicePortIF.findFirstSords(de.elo.ix.client.ClientInfo, de.elo.ix.client.FindInfo, int, de.elo.ix.client.SordZ) and IXServicePortIF.findNextSords(de.elo.ix.client.ClientInfo, String, int, int, de.elo.ix.client.SordZ).
Deliver query by ESearchParams.
Since:
10.99.999.019
See Also:
Serialized Form

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    protected int currentFolderId
    Provide this ID to restrict search on current folder.
    protected boolean highlightedText
    Return highlighted result text for each sord.
    Highlighted text is retrieved from fulltext and surrounded by b-tags.
    Defaults to false.
    protected boolean relevance
    Calculate relevance for each sord.
    Defaults to false.
    protected boolean resultField
    Return fields in which search terms are found for each sord.
    Defaults to false.
    protected ESearchOrderE sort
    Results are ordered by this parameter.
